name: Operation: Mad(ly in) Love
description:
Welcome. In this game you are the Cupid, a spirit of love. Your goal is to spread love through magic radios (video games, am I right?). In the next few levels you will find some teenagers, who have lost their minds because of love. You could say, that they arE OUT OF CON... Ow!... Ok, Im sorry.
Good luck, have fun!

How to play:

AWSD - move
Space - interact
Escape - quit the game
C - go to Credits (you will loose all your progress)
